overviewContent: In my work with MariaDB, I have set up and maintained databases to support web-based systems. I create basic SQL queries to facilitate the development of applications, ensuring they align with the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture. My role involves collaborating with development teams to design efficient database structures that integrate smoothly with back-end logic, supporting the overall systemâ€™s functionality.
